mapinfo.detailsText: Desert mountain area of the American West.\nMap by RF_Gandalf
mapinfo.loadDetailsText: In this arid region you will find 4 or 5 native villages, always of one or two types per map. These can be Mayan, Zapotec, Comanche, Apache, Navajo or Cheyenne. A mountainous area on one side of the map has many gold mines. There can either be one or two trade routes to supplement your economy.\n \nMap by RF_Gandalf
